These are my private pages. Only I can see them, edit them and create new ones.

  • Social Space - Shows my friends and their activities.
  • Work Space - Has my calendar, documents, images...
  • Email - I can configure this page to view my emails.

To add more applications just go to the dock menu and select Add Application

You can also add widgets from any other website. I have already added a widget for facebook which was very easy, by following these steps:

  1. Add Application --> iframe portlet
  2. Go to Configuration of the portlet and set the Url to iphone.facebook.com

Any widget for the iphone will work perfectly in your instance of Liferay Portal using this method.
